column3: “BAM does it again. 28.5% with a scent of strawberry and pine that fills the room and sticks in your nose. A taste similar to the smell that vaporizes to a thick vapor that isn't too rough, but coats your mouth. The taste alone has me coming back, but this strain is a complete package. A slightly energetic and euphoric high slowly kicks in and leads to a sense of comfort and relaxation, but this strain definitely show...”

“I love this strain. I've been hesitant about trying sativa strains since I've tried Jack Herrer. Don't get me wrong, I like Jack. However, the strain causes my chronic pain to worsen so it's a no bueno for me. Strawberry sequoia, on the other hand, is marvelous!!! Incredibly uplifting. Helps me to get motivated and moving so I can be productive and focused without the exacerbated pain.”

“PHENOMENAL SATIVA
It doesn't give me such an energetic buzz as it helps me get motivated.... hard to explain. That taste is amazing in concentrate form. I'm glad I got the highest tier available for this strain, it tastes like Strawberry's n cream. Lasted about 3 hours. Doesn't flare up any anxiety, gives me nothing but optimism and smiles.”

“One of my daytime faves. If I need to get stuff done this is my go to with its smooth strawberry flavor as you take a draw to it's instant lung and head expansion to a strawberry lip balm aftertaste.”
“this strain is rather soothing electric in the way it stimulates the senses”
“I love the high, has a wonderful taste. Does not make you jittery.”
“Incredible motivation and uplifting”

“HOLY YUMMYNESS!
Let me start off by saying I normally couldn't care less about the taste of a strain as long as it's effects are taking care of my medical issues. But the way this tastes is amazing, definite strawberry taste came thru in the shatter I got.
It helped me get all my chores done and gave me great motivation”
“Incredible motivation and uplifting”

“Taste delicious and smells Devine. I have an extremely rough day and with minutes my pain and inflammation more bearable. I’m not getting any of the negative side effects. So I’m not sure who label the dizzy and the paranoia. I’m feeling good.”
“Awesome stuff I love the taste and the high is great as well.Quite uplifting stream and it also took my pain away.”
“this is like diet weed. very weak and doesn't get me very high”
“Great smell, taste, and high. Goes well with a high cbd strain, for me. Get a little kick from this and just sorta smooth things out with something cbd heavy”
“I have the shatter,  very hashy with fruity undertones”
“Great for Maori action , uplifting vibe. Didn’t have any adverse feelings or physical reaction, just drink wooter🤟🏼☺️”
“This was too good. Definitely not for the novice smoker. If you see it, you need to try it.”

“As a chronic fatigue sufferer, I was really excited to try this supposedly high-energy strain. I was disappointed in that regard. It is a great strain for daytime smoking if you’re just going to chill, but it didn’t motivate me to do anything.

The reason I still gave this strain 4 stars is because it is the best smelling weed I have ever smoked. It has an amazing strawberry aroma that I just can’t get enough of!”
“Meh, the first half of my O was good and uplifting but then it's like I needed to smoke double to get the same effects.”

“Best daytime strain that I have ever smoked. Doesn't make you feel high" in the mind but relaxes the body's stress. I also find it to be motivating. It also reduces my PTSD. Not a prudent bedtime choice as it might be hard to still the body. Take this strain seriously. If we all buy it
column4: the dispensaries will follow. I have the best dispensary around and this is now a normal choice. If your serious about your pot

column3: “Picked up this strain new to Thrive in North Las Vegas.  Not bad, could not detect any strawberry scent but the nice euphoric sensation lends nicely for day use.”
“Very Nice! lovely all day smoke. Mellow and smooth. can cause slight paranoia”
